products.name: Fixed Deposit
products.description: Accepts a wide range of currencies including HKD, RMB and other foreign currencies, enabling you to enjoy high interest earning with financial flexibility.
features: Flexible tenors ranging from 1 month to 5 years
products.specialOffers: Extra 0.5% interest rate for deposits over HKD 500,000

products.name: Statement Savings Account
products.description: Provides you with HK dollar and US dollar accounts, allows you to view your financial status at a glance and use your savings flexibly for transactions and withdrawals.
products.specialOffers: No service fee for the first year

products.name: Target Savings Plan
products.description: Assists you achieve your savings goal with steady wealth growth. Features include flexible choice of monthly savings amount and tenors, different tenor options, fixed interest rate upon account opening, and hassle-free installment payment and maturity payment through direct debit authorization.
products.specialOffers: Bonus interest for consistent savings over 12 months

products.name: Easy Cash Personal Loan
products.description: Accepts all types of income proof, providing extra cash simply by providing any kind of the latest 1-month documentary income proof.
benefits: Access to extra cash when needed

products.name: Perfect Fit Personal Loan
products.description: Offers preliminary approval result in as fast as 30 minutes. Loan amount up to 16 times of monthly salary or a maximum of HK$3,000,000.
benefits: Large loan amounts for big expenses
products.specialOffers: Reduced processing fee for online applications

products.name: Balance Transfer Personal Loan
products.description: Provides 1-on-1 service consultation, helping you settle consolidated debts and interests in one go.
products.eligibility: Existing debts with other financial institutions
products.specialOffers: No processing fee for balance transfers over HKD 50,000

products.name: Mortgage Services
products.description: Comprehensive mortgage plans for first-time home buyers, property upgraders or property investors. Includes Preferential Mortgage Plan and 90% Mortgage Plan with various features and benefits.
products.specialOffers: Cash rebate for new mortgage customers

products.name: Visa Infinite Card
products.description: Offers an extraordinary travel experience with up to 20 times bonus points for designated overseas transactions and exclusive travel benefits.

products.name: Platinum Card
products.description: Lets you enjoy spending rebates and easily earn points for online or overseas purchases, which can be redeemed for fabulous gifts.
products.specialOffers: 5% cashback on all purchases for the first 3 months

products.name: Forest Insurance Plan
products.description: Provides multiple potential returns for long-term wealth accumulation, with policy split option and whole life protection. Offers guaranteed interest rate of 5.5% per annum for annual and premium prepayment option.

products.name: Prosperity Booster Whole Life Plan
products.description: A participating life insurance plan that propels long-term savings, offering potentially high returns for wealth accumulation and legacy planning.

products.name: Personal Accident Insurance Plan
products.description: Provides worldwide protection for you and your family in case of accidents, offering financial support at an attractive premium cost.

products.name: HomeHelperPlus Insurance Plan
products.description: Offers comprehensive cover for you and your domestic helper, including legal liability protection, repatriation costs, and service interruption subsidy.
products.eligibility: Available to all employers of domestic helpers
products.specialOffers: No premium increase for the first 2 years
